game.title: Save the Princess
game.objective: Rescue the princess from the evil dragon
game.description: Embark on a dangerous journey to save the princess who was kidnapped by a fearsome dragon. Use your wits and skills to defeat the dragon and bring the princess back to safety.
game.reward: 1000 gold coins and the gratitude of the kingdom

task.description: Finds the ancient sword of legends hidden deep within the enchanted forest.
Follow the clues and tracks to discover the dragon's hideout in the treacherous mountains.
Battle the dragon using the ancient sword and your cunning strategies.
Free the princess from her captivity and guide her safely back to the kingdom.
